p.s: The excerpt of chapter five from page 84 to 87 of the novel The Great Gatsby, written by F. Scott Fitzgerald and published in 1925, deals with the reunion of Jay Gatsby and Daisy.
Before Gatsby has asked Nick to invite Daisy over to his house for tea, to have a chance to meet her again.
Daisy and Nick enter Nick's living room and Gatsby knocks on the door.
They start to talk awkwardly about how they have not seen each other in years.
Nick leaves and Gatsby pulls him into the kitchen to tell him that he wants to leave because of the awkwardness of the situation.
Nickincouragesencourages him to be honest with Daisy and leaves to give the two of them privacy.
It rains outside so after half an hour, Nick reenters the living room and finds Daisy and Gatsby sitting on the sofa.
Daisy had been crying but Gatsby looks happier than ever.
He invites Nick and Daisy over to his house, to show it to them, especially to Daisy.
